data.meta_description: Explore London School of Economics & Political Science reviews, rankings, and statistics. Is it the right college for you?
data.text: while there are some very good resources and a great reputation, and it isn't a bad use of time, lse is on the whole an unfriendly place from its staff to its students. hard to get direct help, people seem to just send you to someone else to deal with the problem. it can be difficult to deal with the school's stuck-up-ness and it does get in the way of the learning experience.
